articles.title: Ford and Volkswagen expand EV partnership to a second electric model for the European market - CNBC
articles.description: Ford said it now expects to produce 1.2 million electric vehicles using Volkswagen's platform over six years, starting in 2023.
articles.content:
Volkswagen is expanding its electric-vehicle collaboration with Ford Motor, the company said Monday, signing on to supply the EV architecture for a second Ford model for the European market.
